item.title: Conflict Resolution and De-Escalation for Upset Customers
item.description: CLIENT MANAGEMENT IS CONFLICT MANAGEMENT Client management is not an easy position. In fact, any relationship management position is tough. Namely, because clients are frequently angry or disappointed at your company. And whose job is it to fix the mess? Yours. Not to mention that you have to both make the company AND the client satisfied. All in all, it's not a very easy position. What most professionals underestimate, however, is the role of conflict management in client management.

2021 Production and Inventory Management professional TOP common and Most Frequent questions with answers for Production and Inventory Management professional
This course will qualify you with the latest and most common questions about Production and Inventory Management
Inventory management refers to the process of ordering, storing and using a company's inventory. This includes the management of raw materials, components and finished products, as well as warehousing and processing such items.

item.title: Business of Logistics - Cargo and inventory management
item.description: This course will give you a good understanding of the Business of Logistics and what is the role of it from our daily operational experience. You will learn what is logistics Management, supply chain management, and procurement as well as we will discuss the transportation of cargo processes via Air cargo and Ocean Cargo. Topics like inventory and warehouse management will be covered. Business of logistics is your guide to develop your logistics skills by knowing what is the role of it.
